title: Ohio Dept. of Health offers a stark metaphor for the importance of social distancing
description: Ohio Dept. of Health offers a stark metaphor for the importance of social distancing
content:
Irish sheep farmer uses large pair of shears for lockdown haircut
While many people have resorted to home haircuts due to the closure of barbers and salons during the COVID-19 pandemic, 62-year-old Irish sheep farmer and sheepdog trainer Donie Anderson took … [+5319 chars]
